name: Unbound Changeling

description: This strange critter has a rather unsettling habit of staring at you while you eat.

spells.description:
Equip: Gain scendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

scendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
